query: How does the current X-ray spectral analysis of Seyfert 2 galaxies extend previous work and motivate further investigation into the nature of these galaxies?

citation_function_classification.justification: The query asks how the new X‑ray spectral analysis builds on earlier studies (Extends) and why it encourages further research into Seyfert 2 galaxies (Motivation).
